name: Hungry Dragon: Feed him Meat Saga
name_original: Hungry Dragon: Feed him Meat Saga
description:
Hungry Dragon: Feed him Meat Saga will feed you all the bouncy fun and great puzzle action that you handle! One of the best puzzle games this year!

Now for the most important part. Your Hungry Dragon is trapped… he has climbed in behind some big crates and the only way to get food to him is to bounce his food! Time is running out and if the food doesn't get there in time he will die :( So you need to act fast and make your Dragon the happiest (and fattest) around!

Download today:
- Addictive and entertaining game play
- Fun, simple and intuitive controls
- Beautiful Graphics
- Amazing Sounds and Effects
- Compete with your friends - Game Center enabled
- Hours of fun for the whole family

Download Hungry Dragon: Feed him Meat Saga today and let us know what you think. Leave a review and rating to let us know what you think of Hungry Dragon.
